scripts.compress: cp dist/index.js ./index.js && zip -r9 dist/connectToPhotonic.zip index.js node_modules package.json; rm index.js
scripts.update-code: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name connectToPhotonic --zip-file fileb://dist/connectToPhotonic.zip --profile photonic-staging
scripts.deploy: yarn tsc && yarn compress && yarn update-code && yarn update-env
